newsitem.title: GERMANY: Hellmann adds Belgium, Egypt partners.
newsitem.headline: Hellmann adds Belgium, Egypt partners.

text.p: International freight forwarder Gebr. Hellmann Gmbh & Co. KG said it has added new partners in Belgium and Egypt to its global network.
The Belgian partner is NV TBC - Halbart Express S.A., based in Brussels and with outlets in Antwerp, Ghent, Liege and Charleroi.
The company was founded in 1979 and employs 120 staff, a Hellmann statement said.
The new Egypt partner is the 42-employee Freight Masters Ltd., founded in 1994 and with offices in Cairo and Alexandria.
The Hellmann Group of Partners now has 365 offices in 118 countries and generated an IATA turnover of 413 million dollars last year. --Air Cargo NewsRoom Tel +44-171-542-7705 Fax +44-171-542-5017
